languages.text: {n}Мужчина бросает на вас сочувствующий взгляд.{/n} "Думаю, среди нас есть те, кто разделяет подобный сантимент. Однако в том и заключается наш долг, не так ли? Превозмогать низменные слабости и желания, дабы как можно лучше служить Богу-Императору, Повелителю Человечества". {n}Ваш собеседник качает головой и поворачивается к вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина бросает на вас сочувствующий взгляд.{/n} "Думаю, среди нас есть те, кто разделяет подобный сантимент. Однако в том и заключается наш долг, не так ли? Превозмогать низменные слабости и желания, дабы как можно лучше служить Богу-Императору, Повелителю Человечества". {n}Ваш собеседник качает головой и поворачивается к вам.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is our duty, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in our service to the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина бросает на вас сочувствующий взгляд.{/n} "Думаю, среди нас есть те, кто разделяет подобный сантимент. Однако в том и заключается наш долг, не так ли? Превозмогать низменные слабости и желания, дабы как можно лучше служить Богу-Императору, Повелителю Человечества". {n}Ваш собеседник качает головой и поворачивается к вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is the duty of Humanity, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in their service to the God-Emperor, their Master." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

{n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is the duty of Humanity, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in their service to the God-Emperor, their Master." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

{n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is our duty, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in our service to the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

{n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is our duty, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in our service to the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个人同情地看了你一眼。{/n}“我相信，我们之中也会有人怀着同样的感觉，但这正是我们的职责，不是吗？我们需要克服我们卑微的弱点与欲望，以便更好地服侍神皇，服侍人类之主。”{n}他摇了摇头，看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is our duty, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in our service to the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人同情地看了你一眼。{/n}“我相信，我们之中也会有人怀着同样的感觉，但这正是我们的职责，不是吗？我们需要克服我们卑微的弱点与欲望，以便更好地服侍神皇，服侍人类之主。”{n}他摇了摇头，看着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hombre te lanza una mirada compasiva.{/n} «Creo que muchos de nosotros compartimos ese sentimiento, pero ese es nuestro deber, ¿no cree? Superar las debilidades y deseos vulgares para realizar un servicio excelente al Dios Emperador, Señor de la Humanidad». {n}Niega con la cabeza y se gira hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is our duty, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in our service to the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre te lanza una mirada compasiva.{/n} «Creo que muchos de nosotros compartimos ese sentimiento, pero ese es nuestro deber, ¿no cree? Superar las debilidades y deseos vulgares para realizar un servicio excelente al Dios Emperador, Señor de la Humanidad». {n}Niega con la cabeza y se gira hacia ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}男はあなたに同情するような視線を送る。{/n}「私たちの中にも、その気持ちを分かち合える人がいると思います。しかし、人類の主である神帝陛下への奉仕において卓越するために、卑劣な弱さと欲望を克服することが私たちの義務です」{n}彼は頭を振ってあなたのほうを向く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is our duty, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in our service to the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男はあなたに同情するような視線を送ります。{/n}「私たちの中にも、その気持ちを分かち合える人がいると思います。しかし、それが私たちの義務ですよね？人類の主である神帝陛下への奉仕において卓越するために、卑劣な弱さと欲望を克服することです」{n}彼は頭を振ってあなたのほうを向く。{/n}
{n}男はあなたに同情するような視線を送る。{/n}「私たちの中にも、その気持ちを分かち合える人がいると思います。しかし、人類の主である神帝陛下への奉仕において卓越するために、卑劣な弱さと欲望を克服することが私たちの義務です」{n}彼は頭を振ってあなたのほうを向く。{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is our duty, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in our service to the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'homme vous lance un regard plein de sympathie.{/n} « Je crois que certains d'entre nous partagent ce sentiment. Mais tel est notre devoir, n'est-ce pas ? Surmonter nos faiblesses et nos désirs primaires afin d'exceller au service de l'Empereur-Dieu, Maître de l'Humanité. » {n}Il secoue la tête et se tourne vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is our duty, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in our service to the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme vous lance un regard plein de sympathie.{/n} « Je crois que certains d'entre nous partagent ce sentiment. Mais tel est notre devoir, n'est-ce pas ? Surmonter nos faiblesses et nos désirs primaires afin d'exceller au service de l'Empereur-Dieu, Maître de l'Humanité. » {n}Il secoue la tête et se tourne vers vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mann blickt dich mitfühlend an.{/n} "Ich glaube, unter uns gibt es tatsächlich welche, die das so empfinden. Aber so lautet nun einmal unsere Pflicht, oder nicht? Schwächen und Wünsche zu überwinden, um in unserem Dienst am Gottimperator, dem Herren der Menschheit, Großes zu leisten." {n}Er schüttelt den Kopf und wendet sich dir zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is our duty, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in our service to the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann blickt dich mitfühlend an.{/n} "Ich glaube, unter uns gibt es tatsächlich welche, die das so empfinden. Aber so lautet nun einmal unsere Pflicht, oder nicht? Schwächen und Wünsche zu überwinden, um in unserem Dienst am Gottimperator, dem Herren der Menschheit, Großes zu leisten." {n}Er schüttelt den Kopf und wendet sich dir zu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adam, seni anlar gibi bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Aramızda bu hissi paylaşanlar olduğuna inanıyorum lakin vazifemiz bu, değil mi? İnsanlığın Efendisi Tanrı İmparator'a olan hizmetimizi en mükemmel şekilde yerine getirebilmek adına temel zaaflarımızı ve arzularımızı aşmak." {n}Başını sallayıp sana doğru dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man gives you a sympathetic look.{/n} "I believe there are those among us who share that sentiment. But such is our duty, is it not? To overcome base weaknesses and desires so as to excel in our service to the God-Emperor, the Master of Humanity." {n}He shakes his head and turns to you.{/n}

İnsanlığın Efendisi Tanrı İmparator'a olan hizmetimizi en mükemmel şekilde yerine getirebilmek adına temel zaaflarımızı ve arzularımızı aşmak." {n}Başını sallayıp sana doğru dönüyor.{/n}
